data.name: Answer1
data.value: The Language Roulette room list only shows the languages you have added to your profile. If you want to learn new languages or get other languages’ rooms, just add those languages to your profile

data.name: Answer2
data.value:
The main way to get hours for your account, is by talking to others in your native languages. You can go to a Language Roulette room of one of your native languages, or you can make private calls in your native languages with your contacts.
You can also earn hours by inviting your friends to Langademy or by following us on Twitter and Facebook.

data.name: Answer3
data.value: If you go to a Language Roulette room and there its empty, you can check if there are any meetups in the meetup board. If there aren’t any, you can create your own meetups. You just have to select the language and the date/time of the meetup.

data.name: Answer4
data.value: Yes. Go to Settings => Privacy, and turn on the “Allow only contact requests from people you have spoken to” option.

data.name: Answer5
data.value: All the meetups take place in a Language Roulette room. You can whether go to the Language Roulette app and select the room, or select the meetup from the meetup board and enter directly to the room when the time comes.

data.name: Answer6
data.value: No, and you don’t have to install anything to use videoconferences on Langademy.

data.name: Answer7
data.value: Langademy is free of any charge. We use a timebanking policy. The time you devote speaking to others in your native languages will be added to your account so you can use it to learn other languages.

data.name: Answer8
data.value: When you are on a conversation within the Language Roulette, you have the option to send a connection request to your partner. Once you are connected, you can send private messages and also make private videocalls.

data.name: Answer9
data.value: Langademy have no language restrictions. It offers rooms for most of the languages of the world. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you think a language is missing

data.name: Question1
data.value: Why are only some rooms available in the Language Roulette room lists?

data.name: Question2
data.value: How can I earn more hours for my account?

data.name: Question3
data.value: There aren’t any available meetups. What can I do?

data.name: Question4
data.value: I have many contact requests from people that I don’t know. Can I avoid this situation?

data.name: Question5
data.value: I have joined a meetup but I don’t know how to go to the meetup

data.name: Question6
data.value: Do I have to use skype?

data.name: Question7
data.value: Do I have to pay to use Langademy?

data.name: Question8
data.value: How can I keep in touch with the people I have chatted in the Language Roulette?

data.name: Question9
data.value: Which languages are available in Langademy?
